fields.label: Button Look

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: video_url
sub_fields.instructions: For youtube or Vimeo, please use their respective embed URLs. For videos uploaded to the site, use its absolute URL.

choices.map2: Google Map API (Google API Key required, add to Theme Options Menu ->  Google Map API Tab)
